name: eqvinc
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wceq(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(c0, universe))

|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))

comment: A variable introduction law for class equality. (Contributed by NM, 14-Apr-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jan-2022.)
